meanings.def: to remove a cover or curtain from a painting, statue, etc. so that it can be seen in public for the first time
examples: The Queen unveiled a plaque to mark the official opening of the hospital.

meanings.def: to show or introduce a new plan, product, etc. to the public for the first time
examples: They will be unveiling their new models at the Motor Show.
The government has unveiled plans for new energy legislation.
